about_the_game:
This work is a text adventure game with the future cyber city as the background and the theme of summer travel and investigation.

In the game, players can play the role of "Park Bo-myeong", the deputy director of the AI ​​Inspection Bureau of Golden City, and make their own choices in serial cases based on their own thinking and judgment with the robot assistant "Dill", and achieve different endings.

The game features high degree of freedom, with 27 words of non-repetitive text and 12 different endings.

Story background


Golden City is an artificial island city located on the west coast of a certain big country. With the joint construction of humans and AI robots, the city has changed from a post-war ruin to a glittering future metropolis.

However, after Golden City became a technologically advanced metropolis, problems such as the polarization between the rich and the poor, environmental pollution, and public security crimes also followed one after another. The city was divided into two large areas: the white area of ​​the rich and the gray area of ​​the poor. The middle of the area is separated by a high wall, and people cannot move easily. The contradiction between humans and AI robots has also intensified.
